titre: üèÜMakita DGA404 125mm/100mm Brushless Lithium Electric Angle Grinder Rechargeable Cutting Machine High Power Polishing Machine
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile angle grinder designed for demanding cutting, grinding, and polishing applications. With its brushless motor and compact design, it delivers exceptional performance and control.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors, extending runtime and reducing wear.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the material being worked on for optimal results.
  • Spindle Lock Button: Simplifies disc changes for quick and easy tool maintenance.
  • Anti-Kickback Protection: Features a mechanism that helps prevent sudden and dangerous tool rotations during cutting operations, enhancing user safety.
  • Lightweight and Compact Design: Provides excellent maneuverability and comfort during prolonged use.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 accepts both 125mm and 100mm discs, offering versatility for different applications. It runs on a powerful Makita Li-ion battery (sold separately) providing ample power for demanding tasks.

  • Disc Diameter: 125mm / 100mm
  • No-Load Speed: Variable speed control, offering a range suitable for various applications.
  • Battery Type: Makita Li-ion (sold separately)

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • High Power Output: Delivers exceptional cutting, grinding, and polishing performance.
  • Increased Efficiency: The brushless motor reduces energy consumption and extends runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and the compact design allow for precise and comfortable operation.
  • Improved Safety: Anti-kickback protection minimizes the risk of dangerous tool rotations during use.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and other materials.
  • Grinding welds, removing rust, and smoothing surfaces.
  • Polishing metal and concrete to achieve a smooth finish.

Designed for versatility, the DGA404 seamlessly transitions between 125mm and 100mm disc sizes to tackle diverse projects with ease.

The Makita DGA404 is the ultimate tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who demand uncompromising performance and reliability in a cordless design.

description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile brushless electric angle grinder designed for demanding DIY projects and professional woodworking. This compact tool boasts impressive performance with its high-speed motor and durable construction, making it ideal for tackling various tasks such as cutting metal, grinding welds, sharpening tools, and smoothing surfaces.

  • Brushless Motor Technology: Delivers exceptional power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise adjustments to match the application and material being worked on.
  • Spindle Lock: Simplifies the process of changing grinding discs quickly and easily.
  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and balanced weight distribution for reduced user fatigue during prolonged use.
  • Protective Guard: Shields the operator from flying debris and enhances safety during operation.

Specifications

This angle grinder is compatible with Makita 18V batteries, providing a cordless and convenient power source.

The DGA404 features a 125mm grinding disc size, offering versatility for various applications.

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 angle grinder offers numerous benefits for both DIY enthusiasts and professionals:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor technology provides a significant boost in power compared to traditional grinders, allowing you to tackle tougher tasks with ease.
  • Enhanced Durability: Constructed from robust materials, this grinder is built to withstand demanding use and provide long-lasting performance.
  • Improved Control: Variable speed control allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task at hand, ensuring optimal results.
  • Cordless Convenience: Compatibility with Makita 18V batteries eliminates the hassle of cords and provides greater freedom of movement.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 angle grinder is a versatile tool suitable for a wide range of applications:

  • Cutting metal, tile, stone, and other hard materials.
  • Grinding welds and removing excess material.
  • Sharpening tools such as chisels, blades, and axes.
  • Smoothing surfaces and preparing them for finishing.

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions and safety guidelines when operating this tool. Wear appropriate protective gear, including eye protection, gloves, and hearing protection.

description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 is a powerful cordless impact wrench designed for professional use in auto repair and other demanding applications. It boasts a brushless motor for exceptional performance and durability, along with an impressive torque output to tackle even the toughest fasteners.

Specifications

The Makita DTW700 is built to withstand heavy-duty use. While exact specifications may vary, it's designed with professional-grade components to ensure reliable performance.

  • Voltage: High voltage output for maximum power.
  • Battery Type: Long-lasting lithium-ion battery technology for sustained runtime.
  • Weight: Designed for balanced handling and comfortable use during extended periods.

Benefits

This impact wrench provides numerous advantages for professionals in auto repair, construction, and other industries:

  • Increased Efficiency: The high torque output and rapid impact mechanism allow for quicker fastener removal and installation.
  • Reduced Physical Strain: Cordless operation and a well-balanced design minimize user fatigue.
  • Enhanced Durability: Robust construction with brushless motor technology ensures long-lasting performance.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is ideal for various tasks requiring significant torque:

  • Auto Repair: Tightening lug nuts, loosening stubborn bolts on engines and suspension components.
  • Construction: Removing and installing large fasteners in structural framing, decks, and other projects.
  • Industrial Maintenance: Tightening and loosening heavy-duty equipment components.

description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile cordless angle grinder designed for demanding cutting, grinding, and polishing tasks. Equipped with a brushless motor, it delivers exceptional performance and durability.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides high power output and extended runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 125mm/100mm Wheel Compatibility: Accepts both 125mm and 100mm grinding discs, offering flexibility for various applications.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed based on the material being worked on, ensuring optimal performance.
  • Soft Start Function: Minimizes kickback and provides smooth starts for increased control.
  • Anti-Restart Prevention: Prevents accidental start-up when the power is restored after a power outage.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 operates on an 18V Lithium-ion battery platform, providing ample power for extended use. Its compact and lightweight design enhances maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Battery Voltage: 18V
  • Wheel Size: 125mm / 100mm
  • No-Load Speed: Variable speed range for optimal performance
  • Weight: Lightweight design for ease of handling

Benefits

The Makita DGA404 offers numerous advantages for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • High Performance: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power and torque for demanding cutting and grinding tasks.
  • Extended Runtime: Lithium-ion batteries provide a long runtime, reducing downtime on the job.
  • Versatility: Accepts both 125mm and 100mm discs, expanding its range of applications.
  • Enhanced Control: Features like variable speed control and soft start minimize kickback and ensure precise operation.
  • Durability: Built with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Cutting metal, stone, and concrete.
  • Grinding welds and removing rust.
  • Polishing surfaces for a smooth finish.
  • Various construction, renovation, and maintenance tasks.

description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile electric drill designed for a wide range of tasks. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional power and torque, making it ideal for drilling into wood, metal, and plastic.

  • Brushless Motor: The absence of brushes means less friction, increased efficiency, and longer tool life.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the speed to match your drilling or driving needs with a smooth and precise dial.
  • Multiple Clutch Settings: Fine-tune the torque output for different materials and applications, preventing overtightening and damage.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Easily switch between drilling and driving modes for added versatility.

Specifications

The Makita DDF487 operates on an 18V battery system and boasts a no-load speed of 1600 RPM. It is lightweight and ergonomically designed for comfortable use, even during extended periods.

Its compact size allows for access to tight spaces.

Benefits

The combination of power, versatility, and user-friendly design makes the Makita DDF487 a valuable addition to any toolbox.

  • High Performance: Tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks with ease thanks to the powerful brushless motor.
  • Improved Efficiency: The brushless motor design reduces energy consumption and prolongs tool life, saving you money in the long run.
  • Increased Control: Variable speed and clutch settings allow for precise control over your projects, preventing damage to materials and tools.
  • Comfortable Operation: Lightweight construction and an ergonomic design minimize fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Drilling into wood, metal, and plastic
  • Driving screws and fasteners
  • General construction tasks
  • Home improvement projects

Remember to always use appropriate safety gear, such as eye protection and gloves, when operating power tools.

description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile electric drill designed for both drilling and driving tasks. With its brushless motor, variable speed control, and multiple settings, it offers precise control and efficiency across a range of applications.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers exceptional power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task at hand, from delicate screwing to robust drilling.
  • Multiple Clutch Settings: Enables you to select the appropriate torque level for different screw sizes and materials, preventing over-tightening or damage.
  • LED Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in tight spaces or dimly lit areas.

Specifications

Powered by an 18V battery, this drill boasts a high operating speed of 1600 RPM and is ergonomically designed for comfortable handling during extended use.

Benefits

The Makita DDF487 offers several key benefits:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power with less energy consumption, extending runtime and improving performance.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and multiple clutch settings allow for precise adjustments, ensuring accuracy and preventing damage to materials.
  • Improved Visibility: The integrated LED light illuminates the work area for greater clarity and reduced eye strain.

Usage

This versatile drill is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Drilling into wood, metal, and plastic.
  • Driving screws of various sizes.
  • Home improvement projects.
  • DIY tasks around the house or workshop.

With its robust construction and reliable performance, the Makita DDF487 is a valuable tool for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts.

titre: üèÜMakita DTW285 18V Brushless Electric Screwdriver 280N.m 1/2" Socket Rechargeable Drill Driver Compatible with Makita 18V Batte
description:
Features

The Makita DTW285 is a powerful and versatile electric screwdriver designed to tackle demanding tasks with ease. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional torque, allowing you to drive even the toughest screws and bolts.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides superior power, efficiency, and longevity compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: 280 N.m of torque: Ensures you have the muscle to drive even large fasteners with confidence.
  • 1/2" Socket Drive: Accommodates a wide range of sockets and attachments, expanding the tool's versatility for various applications.
  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the speed according to the task at hand, providing precise control for both delicate and heavy-duty work.
  • Lightweight and Compact Design: Ensures comfortable handling and maneuverability in tight spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DTW285 18V Brushless Electric Screwdriver is powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery (sold separately). It features a robust construction with durable materials to withstand demanding use.

Benefits

This powerful screwdriver offers numerous advantages:

  • Increased Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power and runtime compared to brushed motors, saving you time and energy.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control allows for precise adjustments, minimizing the risk of overdriving screws or stripping materials.
  • Versatility: The 1/2" socket drive accommodates a wide range of attachments, making it suitable for various drilling and driving applications.
  • Reduced Fatigue: The lightweight and compact design minimizes user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DTW285 is an ideal tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts working in a variety of settings, including:

  • Construction: Driving large screws and bolts in framing, decking, and other structural applications.
  • Automotive Repair: Tightening and loosening fasteners on vehicles.
  • Home Improvement: Assembling furniture, installing fixtures, and completing various DIY projects.

Remember to always use the appropriate safety gear when operating power tools.

description:
Features

The Original Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding drilling and driving tasks. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional torque and speed, making it ideal for a wide range of applications.

  • Variable Speed Control: Offers precise control over drilling and driving speed for different materials and applications.

  • Ergonomic Design: Features a comfortable grip and lightweight construction for reduced user fatigue.

The DTD173 Impact Driver is compatible with Makita 18V batteries, offering a wide range of runtime options. Its compact design allows for maneuverability in tight spaces.

  • Torque Output: Up to 180N.m
  • Battery Compatibility: Makita 18V batteries (sold separately)
  • Chuck Size: Standard drill chuck size for versatility in bit selection.

The Original Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver offers numerous benefits that make it a valuable addition to any toolbox. Its powerful motor and high torque output allow you to complete demanding tasks with ease, while its variable speed control provides precise control over your work.

  • Enhanced Control and Accuracy: Variable speed control allows for precise adjustments based on the material and task.
  • Reduced User Fatigue: The ergonomic design and lightweight construction minimize strain during extended use.

Usage

The DTD173 Impact Driver is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving screws and fasteners of various sizes.
  • Drilling into wood, metal, and concrete (with appropriate drill bits).
  • Assembly and disassembly tasks in construction, home improvement, and automotive repair.

Always wear appropriate safety gear, including eye protection and gloves, when operating this tool.

description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a powerful and versatile cordless driver drill designed for demanding applications. It boasts a brushless motor, offering increased efficiency, runtime, and durability compared to traditional brushed motors.

  • Variable Speed Control: Allows you to adjust the drill speed according to your specific needs, from delicate screw driving to high-impact drilling.
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates your work area for improved visibility in dark or confined spaces.
  • Compact and Ergonomic Design: Ensures comfortable handling and maneuverability even during prolonged use.

Specifications

The Makita DDF487 is powered by an 18V lithium-ion battery, providing a long runtime for extended work sessions. The tool features a robust chuck that securely holds drill bits and screwdriver attachments.

Benefits

By combining a brushless motor with cordless convenience, the Makita DDF487 offers numerous benefits:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor delivers exceptional torque for demanding drilling and driving applications.
  • Enhanced Runtime: Lithium-ion batteries provide long runtimes, minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity.
  • Durability: Brushless motors are more durable and require less maintenance than traditional brushed motors.
  • Versatility: With variable speed control and a wide range of compatible bits and attachments, the DDF487 can handle various tasks around the home or workshop.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is ideal for a variety of applications, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic
  • Driving screws into various materials
  • Assembling furniture and other projects
  • Home improvement and DIY tasks
  • Light-duty construction work

Benefits

The compact design reduces fatigue during prolonged use, making it ideal for professionals who spend extended periods working in various positions. Its compatibility with Makita 18V batteries offers a convenient and versatile power solution.

  • Various other industrial and automotive applications

The DTW700 is a versatile and powerful tool that will become an indispensable asset in your workshop or toolbox.

The Makita DTW700 Electric Impact Wrench offers several advantages that make it a valuable tool for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Durable Construction: Built to withstand heavy use and provide long-lasting performance.

Usage

The DTW700 is a versatile tool suitable for various applications, including:

  • Automotive Repair and Maintenance:
    • Removing lug nuts, tightening engine components, and more.

  • DIY Projects: Tackling home improvement tasks that require high torque, such as assembling furniture or working with heavy-duty hardware.

description:

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver designed for demanding tasks in various applications. This tool boasts an LXT brushless motor, providing exceptional power and efficiency.

This impact driver offers several advantages for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor provides ample power to tackle even the most challenging fasteners.
  • Improved Runtime: LXT batteries deliver extended runtime, reducing downtime on the job.
  • Versatility: With forward/reverse functionality and a T-Mode setting, this tool can handle a wide range of tasks.
  • Controllability: The variable speed trigger allows for precise torque adjustment.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 is ideal for various applications, including:

  • Driving screws and bolts in wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects.
  • Construction and renovation tasks.

description:
Features

The Makita 18V DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for professional use. This impact gun combines the torque of a screwdriver with the speed of an impact wrench, making it ideal for driving screws and nuts in a variety of materials.

  • Powerful motor: Delivers high torque output for demanding fastening tasks.
  • Compact and lightweight design: Provides excellent maneuverability and user comfort.
  • Variable speed trigger: Allows for precise control over rotation speed.
  • Forward/reverse switch: Enables both driving and loosening of fasteners.
  • Integrated LED light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility.

Specifications

This cordless screwdriver is powered by an 18V Makita lithium-ion battery (sold separately). The DTD173 features a brushless motor, ensuring high performance and long tool life. It operates at variable speeds up to a high RPM for versatile applications.

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

  • Increased efficiency: Quickly and easily drive screws and nuts with the powerful impact mechanism.
  • Enhanced control: The variable speed trigger and forward/reverse switch provide precise fastening.
  • Cordless convenience: Work wirelessly for greater mobility and flexibility in tight spaces.
  • Durability and reliability: Built to withstand tough jobsite conditions with Makita's renowned quality.

Usage

This versatile tool is suitable for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Construction and remodeling projects.
  • Automotive repair and maintenance.
  • Furniture assembly and repair.
  • General household tasks.

Always wear appropriate safety gear, such as eye protection and work gloves, when using power tools. Read the instruction manual carefully before operating the Makita DTD173 Cordless Screwdriver.

  • Clutch Settings: Multiple settings to prevent overtightening and damage to fasteners

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 offers numerous benefits that make it a valuable asset for auto repair professionals:

  • Increased Productivity: Powerful motor and high torque output enable faster work completion.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: Precise speed control and clutch settings ensure accurate fastening.
  • Reduced Fatigue: Compact and lightweight design minimizes user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

This versatile screwdriver is ideal for a wide range of auto repair tasks:

  • Tightening and loosening lug nuts, bolts, and other fasteners.
  • Assembling and disassembling components.
  • Working in confined spaces due to its compact size.

Features

The Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver is a powerful and versatile tool designed for professional use. It boasts a robust brushless motor delivering impressive torque for driving large screws and fasteners with ease.

  • Variable Speed Control: Allows for precise speed adjustment based on the application.

The Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver offers several key benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike:

titre: NEW Makita DTD173 1800RPM Cordless Impact Driver 180N.m Brushless Motor Electric Drill Wood/Bolt/T-Mode For Makita Battery Pins
description:
Makita DTD173 Cordless Impact Driver

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver, designed to tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks with ease. Powered by a brushless motor, this tool delivers impressive torque and speed, making it ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

Features

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers high power and runtime efficiency for extended use
  • Variable Speed Control with Reverse: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed, with a reverse function for easy removal of fasteners
  • T-Mode Functionality: Provides torque adjustment options for different materials and applications
  • LED Job Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit environments
  • Ergonomic Design: Contoured grip and lightweight construction ensure comfortable handling and reduced fatigue during extended use

Specifications

Motor Type: Brushless

No Load Speed: 1800 RPM

Max Torque Output: 180 N.m

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 offers a range of benefits, including:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers powerful performance while maximizing runtime for extended work sessions.
  • Precise Control and Versatility: Variable speed control with reverse and the T-Mode functionality allow for precise adjustments to tackle a variety of materials and tasks.
  • Improved Visibility and Convenience: The integrated LED job light enhances visibility in dark areas, while the ergonomic design reduces fatigue for comfortable operation.

Usage

The Makita DTD173 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving Screws and Bolts: From small fasteners to large construction screws, this impact driver provides the torque needed for quick and efficient driving.
  • Drilling in Wood and Metal: The powerful motor allows you to drill pilot holes or make full-depth holes in various materials with ease.
  • Driving Studs and Nails: Use the impact driver's specialized settings to effectively drive studs and nails for construction projects.

description:
100% Makita DTD173 Brushless Impact Driver

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver built for professionals demanding top-tier performance. This tool seamlessly integrates with the Makita 18V battery system, delivering exceptional torque and speed to tackle even the toughest drilling and fastening applications.

Features

  • Brushless motor technology: Offers increased power output and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • 180 Nm of max torque: Provides ample power for driving large fasteners into various materials.
  • Variable speed control: Allows you to adjust the speed based on the task at hand, ensuring precise control and accuracy.
  • Compact and lightweight design: Enhances maneuverability in tight spaces and reduces operator fatigue during prolonged use.
  • Forward/reverse switch: Enables easy switching between driving and loosening operations.

Specifications

Battery System: Makita 18V LXT Lithium-Ion (sold separately)

Torque: 180 Nm (Max)

Impact Rate: Impacts per minute (imp/min) - Specifications will vary based on battery used.

Chuck Size: Standard hex chuck size for bit compatibility.

Benefits

  • Increased Productivity: The powerful motor and high torque output allow for faster driving times, saving you valuable time on the job site.
  • Enhanced Accuracy: Variable speed control provides precise control over fastener insertion, minimizing stripped screws or damaged materials.
  • Greater Comfort: The compact and lightweight design reduces fatigue and allows for easier handling, even during extended use.

Usage

This impact driver is ideal for a wide range of professional applications, including:

  • Driving large fasteners (screws, bolts) in various materials like wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Demolition tasks involving loosening or removing stubborn fasteners.
  • Construction projects requiring precise fastening and high torque output.

description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 is a powerful cordless impact wrench designed for demanding fastening applications. Equipped with a brushless motor, it delivers exceptional torque and runtime. This tool is ideal for professionals and DIY enthusiasts who need to tackle heavy-duty tasks.

  • Brushless Motor: The brushless motor technology provides increased power and efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors. It also offers extended tool life and reduced maintenance requirements.
  • High Torque Output: With 1000 N.m of maximum torque, this impact wrench can handle even the most challenging fasteners with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: A variable speed trigger allows for precise control over the output speed, enabling you to adjust the torque according to the application.
  • 1/2-Inch Drive Size: The 1/2-inch drive size accommodates a wide range of sockets and accessories, making it versatile for various tasks.
  • Forward/Reverse Switch: Easily switch between forward and reverse rotation for driving or removing fasteners.

Specifications

This impact wrench operates on Makita 18V lithium-ion batteries (sold separately). The tool features a durable construction with a comfortable ergonomic grip for extended use.

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 offers several benefits for users:

  • Increased Power and Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers exceptional torque output and runtime, enhancing productivity.
  • Enhanced Durability: Its robust construction ensures long-lasting performance even under heavy workloads.
  • Precise Control: The variable speed trigger allows for customized adjustments based on the application.
  • Versatility: The 1/2-inch drive size and wide range of compatible accessories make it suitable for diverse fastening tasks.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is ideal for a variety of applications, including:

  • Automotive Repair and Maintenance
  • Construction and Remodeling
  • Industrial Applications
  • Home Improvement Projects

Always follow the manufacturer's instructions and safety guidelines when using this tool.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact drill driver designed for demanding applications. It boasts a brushless motor for increased efficiency and runtime, along with an ergonomic design for user comfort.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers high torque output and extended runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Compact Design: Provides exceptional maneuverability in tight spaces and reduces fatigue during extended use.
  • Variable Speed Trigger: Allows for precise control over drilling and driving speed, suitable for a variety of materials.
  • Hammer Function: Enables drilling into concrete and masonry with ease.
  • LED Job Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit environments.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 is built to withstand rigorous use with durable construction and quality components. Its compact size and lightweight design make it easy to handle.

Experience the benefits of cordless power with the Makita DHP487. The brushless motor provides longer runtime, allowing you to work efficiently without frequent recharging. Its compact size enhances maneuverability in tight spaces, while the hammer function expands its capabilities for drilling into various materials.

The variable speed trigger and LED job light further contribute to a user-friendly experience, ensuring precise control and improved visibility.

Usage

This versatile impact drill driver is ideal for a wide range of applications. Use it for driving screws, drilling holes in wood, metal, and plastic, as well as hammering into concrete and masonry. The Makita DHP487 is a valuable tool for both professional contractors and DIY enthusiasts.

Remember to always wear appropriate safety gear, including eye protection and hearing protection when operating power tools.

description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 is a versatile cordless impact drill that combines the power of an electric hammer drill with the convenience of wireless operation. This tool is packed with features to tackle a wide range of drilling and driving tasks.

  • Cordless Operation: Enjoy freedom of movement and eliminate the hassle of cords, making it perfect for working in tight spaces or on large projects.
  • Impact Driving: Deliver powerful torque for quickly driving screws and fasteners into tough materials.
  • Hammer Drill Functionality: Drill through masonry and concrete with ease thanks to the built-in hammer function.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the drilling speed according to the material and task for optimal performance.
  • LED Job Light: Illuminate your work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The Makita DHP487 is powered by a high-capacity lithium-ion battery, delivering long runtime and consistent power throughout its use. The compact design makes it comfortable to handle during extended periods of operation.

This powerful and versatile tool offers numerous benefits for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts:

  • Increased Productivity: Complete tasks faster with the high torque and variable speed control.
  • Improved Versatility: Tackle a wide range of projects, from drilling into wood to driving screws in metal and even drilling through masonry.
  • Enhanced Comfort: The lightweight and ergonomic design reduces user fatigue during extended use.

Usage

The Makita DHP487 is suitable for a variety of applications, including:

  • Drilling holes in wood, metal, and concrete.
  • Driving screws into various materials.
  • Assembling furniture and other DIY projects.
  • Home improvement tasks such as installing shelves, hooks, or light fixtures.

Always ensure the battery is fully charged before use. Follow the manufacturer's instructions carefully for optimal performance and safety.

description:

The Makita DTW700 is a powerful brushless impact wrench designed for demanding professional use. It boasts impressive torque output and speed, making it ideal for tackling heavy-duty fastening applications.

  • Variable Speed Control: Provides precise control over output speed for optimal results in various applications.

Specifications

This Makita impact wrench is engineered with quality components and meets demanding industry standards.

  • Voltage: 18V Lithium-Ion Battery Compatible (sold separately)
  • Drive Size: 1/2 Inch
  • Chuck Type: Friction Ring
  • Torque: Up to 1000 Nm
  • No Load Speed: High speed range for quick fastening

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 offers a range of benefits that make it a valuable tool for professionals.

  • Increased Productivity: The high torque output and powerful brushless motor allow you to complete tasks faster and more efficiently.
  • Improved Control: Variable speed control provides precise adjustments for delicate or demanding applications.
  • Reduced Fatigue: Ergonomic design and comfortable grip minimize hand strain during extended use.
  • Durability and Reliability: Built with high-quality components to withstand tough jobsite conditions.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is versatile and suitable for a wide range of applications in various industries:

  • Automotive Repair and Maintenance: Tightening lug nuts, removing stubborn fasteners.
  • Construction and Building: Securing structural components, fastening bolts and nuts.
  • Industrial Applications: Heavy-duty tightening tasks in manufacturing or maintenance.

description:
Features

The Makita DDF487 is a compact and powerful cordless drill driver designed to tackle a wide range of drilling and driving tasks. Its brushless motor delivers exceptional torque for demanding applications, while its variable speed control allows for precise adjustments to match the task at hand.

  • Brushless Motor: Provides increased power efficiency, longer runtime, and extended tool life compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Compact Design: The DDF487 is ergonomically designed for enhanced comfort and maneuverability in tight spaces.
  • Variable Speed Control: Offers a wide range of speeds (0-1,700 RPM) for versatility and control over drilling and driving tasks.
  • LED Light: illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dark or confined spaces.

Specifications

Voltage: 18V
Chuck Size:

Benefits

The Makita DDF487 offers numerous benefits for both professional and DIY users:

  • High Torque Output: Easily handles tough drilling and driving jobs with ease.
  • Extended Runtime: The brushless motor delivers longer run times on a single charge, maximizing productivity.
  • Versatility: A wide range of speed settings and compact design make it suitable for diverse tasks and workspaces.
  • Improved Efficiency: Brushless motors are more energy-efficient, reducing power consumption and operating costs.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Drilling into wood, metal, and plastic
  • Driving screws of various sizes
  • Assembling furniture and home improvement projects
  • General DIY tasks around the house or workshop

Always ensure you are using the correct drill bit for the material being drilled and follow all safety precautions outlined in the user manual.

titre: üèÜMakita DHP487 Screwdriver Cordless Percussion Drill 18V Electric Variable Speed Brushless Motor Impact Power Tools Power Drill
description:
Features

The Makita DHP487 Screwdriver Cordless Percussion Drill is a powerful and versatile tool designed to tackle a wide range of drilling and driving tasks.

  • Brushless Motor: The 18V cordless drill features a brushless motor for increased efficiency, longer runtime, and extended tool life.
  • Variable Speed Trigger: Provides precise control over speed settings for optimal performance in various materials.
  • Percussion Drilling: Delivers impactful force for efficient drilling in concrete and masonry.
  • LED Work Light: Illuminates the work area for improved visibility in dimly lit spaces.

Specifications

The DHP487 is built to deliver reliable performance with robust construction:

  • Voltage: 18V
  • Impact Driver: Yes
  • Cordless Design: Allows for maneuverability and freedom of movement during use.

Benefits

The Makita DHP487 offers numerous advantages that make it a valuable addition to any tool collection:

  • Increased Efficiency: The brushless motor delivers more power and runtime compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Enhanced Control: The variable speed trigger allows for precise adjustment of drilling and driving speed, improving accuracy and reducing damage to materials.
  • Versatility: Suitable for a wide range of tasks, from drilling in wood and metal to driving screws and percussion drilling in concrete.

Usage

titre: üê≤Makita Electric Wrench DTW700 Brushless Multi functional Rechargeable 18V Auto Repair 1000N.M High Torque Cordless Impact Wren
description:
Features

The Makita DTW700 brushless electric wrench is a powerful and versatile tool designed for demanding automotive repair tasks. It combines high torque output with cordless convenience, making it ideal for professionals who need a reliable solution on the go.

  • Brushless Motor: Delivers long runtime and exceptional power efficiency compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: With 1000Nm of maximum torque, this wrench can handle even the toughest fastening jobs with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: Adjust the speed to match the application for precise control and optimal performance.
  • Forward/Reverse Function: Switch between forward and reverse rotation for both tightening and loosening applications.
  • Compact and Lightweight Design: Designed for improved maneuverability in tight spaces, reducing fatigue during extended use.

Specifications

This powerful impact wrench operates on Makita's 18V lithium-ion battery platform. It features an integrated LED light to illuminate work areas and a belt hook for convenient storage.

Benefits

The Makita DTW700 offers numerous advantages over traditional corded impact wrenches:

  • Cordless Freedom: Work anywhere without being tethered to an outlet, providing increased mobility and flexibility.
  • Enhanced Power Efficiency: The brushless motor significantly reduces power consumption, extending runtime between charges.
  • Increased Durability: Built with high-quality materials for long-lasting performance and resistance to wear and tear.
  • User-Friendly Design: Intuitive controls and ergonomic design ensure comfortable and efficient operation.

Usage

The Makita DTW700 is ideal for a wide range of automotive repair tasks, including:

  • Wheel Lug Nut Tightening/Loosening
  • Engine Component Installation/Removal
  • Suspension Repair and Maintenance
  • Brake System Work
  • Other Heavy-Duty Fastening Applications

Always follow safety precautions when operating power tools. Wear appropriate eye protection and gloves, and secure your workpiece properly.

titre: üèÜü•áMakita DGA404 18v for Makita power tools Grinder Tool Wireless Power Tools Electric Grinder Angle Grinder Brushless Sander A
description:
Features

The Makita DGA404 is a powerful and versatile angle grinder designed to tackle a wide range of tasks. Its brushless motor delivers impressive performance and runtime, making it ideal for demanding applications.

  • Brushless Motor: The DGA404 features a high-performance brushless motor that provides superior power output, longer runtime, and enhanced durability compared to traditional brushed motors.
  • Wireless Operation: 18V lithium-ion battery technology allows for cordless operation, providing freedom of movement and convenience on the job site.
  • Variable Speed Control: Easily adjust the grinding speed to match the material being worked on for optimal results. This control allows for precision and finesse in various applications.
  • Gearbox Design: A robust gearbox delivers reliable performance under heavy load, ensuring smooth operation and power transmission throughout a range of tasks.

Specifications

The Makita DGA404 is built with quality materials and engineering to ensure reliable performance.

Benefits

Experience the advantages of the Makita DGA404 angle grinder:

  • Increased Power: The brushless motor delivers exceptional power output, allowing you to tackle tough jobs with ease.
  • Longer Runtime: Enjoy extended runtime thanks to the efficient 18V lithium-ion battery technology.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control provides precise speed adjustments for a variety of materials and applications.
  • Durable Construction: The Makita DGA404 is built with rugged components to withstand demanding use.

Usage

The Makita DGA404 angle grinder is versatile enough for a wide range of tasks:

  • Grinding and Cutting: Use the DGA404 to grind and cut metal, concrete, stone, and other materials.

titre: Makita DTD173 1800rpm Cordless Impact Driver 180N.m Brushless Motor Electric Drill Wood/Bolt/T-Mode For Makita 18v Battery PIN
description:
Features

The Makita DTD173 is a powerful and versatile cordless impact driver designed to tackle demanding drilling and driving tasks. This tool boasts a robust brushless motor that delivers exceptional torque, allowing you to effortlessly drive large fasteners and work with tough materials.

  • Brushless Motor: The DTD173 is equipped with a high-performance brushless motor that provides more power and runtime compared to brushed motors.
  • High Torque Output: With an impressive 180Nm of torque, this impact driver can handle heavy-duty applications with ease.
  • Variable Speed Control: The DTD173 offers variable speed control for precise application, allowing you to adjust the output based on the task at hand.
  • Multiple Modes: The tool features three distinct modesDriving, Drilling, and T-Modegiving you versatility for a wide range of applications.

Specifications

The Makita DTD173 is powered by an 18V Makita battery (sold separately). It has a no-load speed of 1800 RPM and delivers consistent performance even under heavy loads.

  • Voltage: 18V
  • No-Load Speed: 1800 RPM
  • Torque: 180 Nm

Benefits

The Makita DTD173 cordless impact driver offers numerous benefits for professionals and DIY enthusiasts alike.

  • Increased Efficiency: The powerful motor and high torque output allow you to complete tasks faster, saving time and effort.
  • Enhanced Control: Variable speed control and multiple modes provide precise control over the driving process.
  • Cordless Convenience: The cordless design offers freedom of movement and eliminates the hassle of cords.
  • Durable Construction: The DTD173 is built to withstand demanding use with its robust construction and impact-resistant components.

Usage

This versatile impact driver is ideal for a wide range of applications, including:

  • Driving Screws and Bolts: The DTD173 excels at driving large screws and bolts into wood, metal, and other materials.
  • Drilling Holes: The drilling mode allows you to create precise holes in a variety of materials.
  • Working in Tight Spaces: Its compact design makes it suitable for working in confined areas.

Remember to always use appropriate safety gear when operating the Makita DTD173. Consult the user manual for detailed instructions and safety precautions.

Usage

Benefits

Experience the advantages of cordless power and control with the Makita DDF487. This versatile tool empowers you to tackle a variety of projects efficiently and accurately.

  • Cordless Freedom: Enjoy the mobility and convenience of cordless operation without sacrificing power or performance.

Usage

The Makita DDF487 is ideal for a wide range of applications in both professional and DIY settings. Use it to drill holes in various materials, drive screws with increased torque, assemble furniture, repair projects, and more. Always wear appropriate safety gear when operating power tools.
